<script src="/bundles/js?v=qwTeZQD3sGxfnaoBXSfoKNuqg4PG14x2IyQgVk85I5w1"></script>



    <script type="text/javascript">
        function do_search() {
            document.location = "/search-results/search-results.aspx?q=" + document.getElementById("q").value;
            return false;
        }
    </script>
    <script>
        function getParameterByName(name) {
            name = name.replace(/[\[]/, "\\[").replace(/[\]]/, "\\]");
            var regex = new RegExp("[\\?&]" + name + "=([^&#]*)"),
                results = regex.exec(location.search);
            return results === null ? "" : decodeURIComponent(results[1].replace(/\+/g, " "));
        }

        $(document).ready(function () {
            $('.login_links').delay(500).slideDown(300);
            if (window.location.pathname == "/" || getParameterByName('l') == "1") {
                document.getElementById("olbUsername").focus();
            }
            //check for mobile view - if mobile, show green border for hero banners
            removeHeroStyle();
        });

        $(window).resize(function () {
            removeHeroStyle();
        });

        function removeHeroStyle() {
            if ($('.tablet').css('display') == "block") {
                $('.home_hero_caption').removeAttr('style');
            }
        }
	</script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        jQuery(function ($) {
            if (/chrom(e|ium)/.test(navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase())) {
                $('body').css('opacity', '1.0')
            }
        })
    </script>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        function submitonEnter(evt) {
            var charCode = (evt.which) ? evt.which : event.keyCode
            if (charCode == "13") {
                SignOnClicked();
                return false;
            }
        }

        function SignOnClicked() {
            if (document.getElementById("olbUsername").value.length < 1) {
                alert("Please enter your Username.");
                document.getElementById("olbUsername").focus();
                return;
            }

            var signOn = document.getElementById("divSignOn");
            if (signOn == null)
                return;
            signOn.style.visibility = 'hidden'

            var form = document.createElement("form");
            form.setAttribute("method", "post");
            form.setAttribute("action", "https://my.veridiancu.org/Authentication/Username");

            var olbUser = document.createElement("input");
            olbUser.setAttribute("type", "hidden");
            olbUser.setAttribute("name", "UserName");
            olbUser.setAttribute("value", document.getElementById("olbUsername").value);
            form.appendChild(olbUser);

            document.body.appendChild(form);
            form.submit();

            return true;
        }
		
    </script>
	
	<!-- Clickjacking Prevention -->
    <style id="antiClickjack">body{display:none;} </style>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        if (self === top) {
            var antiClickjack = document.getElementById("antiClickjack");
            antiClickjack.parentNode.removeChild(antiClickjack);
        } else {
            top.location = self.location;
        }
    </script>

    t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,

<p style="margin-bottom:1.7em;"><span style="color: rgb(255, 255, 255); font-size: 1.65em; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.2em;">Rates</span></p>

<ul>
	<li>
	<p>&nbsp;SPECIAL: 18-Month CD</p>

	<p style="font-size:1.85em;font-weight:bold;color:#fff;">2.18%</p>

	<p>APY**</p>

	<p><span style="font-size: 0.85em;">$1000 minimum</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>&nbsp;SPECIAL: 18-Month Jumbo CD</p>

	<p style="font-size:1.85em;font-weight:bold;color:#fff;">2.28%</p>

	<p>APY**</p>

	<p><span style="font-size: 0.85em;">$100,000 minimum</span></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>2016 and newer, 48 Month<br />
	Auto Loan as low as</p>

	<p style="font-size:1.85em;font-weight:bold;color:#fff;">2.39%</p>

	<p><a href="/contact-us/?kbid=12579" target="_blank">Loyalty APR*</a></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>5 yr Fixed HELOC</p>

	<p style="font-size:1.85em;font-weight:bold;color:#fff;">3.40%</p>

	<p><a href="/contact-us/?kbid=12579" target="_blank">Loyalty APR*</a></p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>15 yr Fixed Home Loan<br />
	as low as</p>

	<p style="font-size:1.85em;font-weight:bold;color:#fff;">3.835%</p>

	<p>APR*</p>
	</li>
	<li>
	<p>30 yr Fixed Home Loan<br />
	as low as</p>

	<p style="font-size:1.85em;font-weight:bold;color:#fff;">4.205%</p>

	<p>APR*</p>
	</li>
</ul>

                    <div class="group_1of2 first">
                	    <div class="inset_r">
                            <p>As a credit union, we&rsquo;re organized differently than other financials. Veridian is a not-for-profit financial cooperative owned by our members. That means all net earnings are returned to members in the form of lower loan rates, higher savings rates, and low-to-no fees. Veridian is also governed by a volunteer board of directors who are elected by our members. Each member has one vote in the election for our board regardless of how much money that individual has on deposit.</p>

<p><a class="btn" href="/belong/membership/about-veridian.aspx" title="Learn More About Veridian Credit Union" aria-label="Learn More About Veridian Credit Union">Learn More</a></p>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var Comm100API = Comm100API || new Object;
        Comm100API.chat_buttons = Comm100API.chat_buttons || [];
        var comm100_chatButton = new Object;
        comm100_chatButton.code_plan = 301;
        comm100_chatButton.div_id = 'comm100-button-301';
        Comm100API.chat_buttons.push(comm100_chatButton);
        Comm100API.site_id = 1000079;
        Comm100API.main_code_plan = 301;

        var comm100_lc = document.createElement('script');
        comm100_lc.type = 'text/javascript';
        comm100_lc.async = true;
        comm100_lc.src = 'https://chat.veridiancu.org/chatserver/livechat.ashx?siteId=' + Comm100API.site_id;
        var comm100_s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        comm100_s.parentNode.insertBefore(comm100_lc, comm100_s);

        setTimeout(function () {
            if (!Comm100API.loaded) {
                var lc = document.createElement('script');
                lc.type = 'text/javascript';
                lc.async = true;
                lc.src = 'https://chat.veridiancu.org/chatserver/livechat.ashx?siteId=' + Comm100API.site_id;
                var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
                s.parentNode.insertBefore(lc, s);
            }
        }, 5000)

	function ariaLiveChat() {
            $('#comm100-float-button-2').attr('aria-label', 'Live Chat');
        }

	setTimeout(ariaLiveChat, 5000);
    </script>
